About

My name is Josh Davis.

I'm a software engineer and Computer Scientist studying at Iowa State University until May 2014.

I like simple things that work well. I'm passionate in all that I do. I think learning is the ultimate pursuit of humankind. I never save anything for the swim back.

When I'm not trying to change the world through code, I can often be found reading and collecting books, road biking, listening to music, watching baseball, and drinking tea.

Contact

Feel free to contact me through email, Twitter, Facebook, or Google+. I like to talk with people.

If you'd like to contact me securely, feel free to encrypt any emails that you'd like to send to me using my PGP public key.
